title: Istobarra Rising
description: As Medri makes her way in the world, she makes new allies and new enemies. The world around her changes and she must adapt if she wants to stay alive. Maldev finds his drive and passion in life is challenged with the arrival of this new female dark elf. As he learns more about her he finds that he learns more about himself. The two of them become entangled in a web of intrigue, suspense, and adventure. Camberlin has found the artifact that he has been searching for his entire life. Unfortunately, the crew of The Tempest, with the addition of two dark elves, stand in his way. This book continues the epic adventures of the Orbbelgguren series
author: Stephen Christiansen
